Blog.post: I can't seem to find my Microsoft Office 2000 CD anywheres at my house which if you ask me is a load of crap! I had to re-register frontpage with my new user on the computer, and I couldn't find the CD so there's nothing I can do (for now) - Shippo-chan

Today so far...hmmm......... let's see: (not in order) I played with my dog star watched sum TV had one of them small pizzas 4 lunch used the computer updated my urlLink website thats all - Shippo Chan
*yawns* man im so bored today of course it's only 9:57am here I just hate being bored... - Shippo Chan
Finally! Acutal sun!!! Im sooo happy ! :) - Shippo Chan
Finally, the sun has (partially) come out!! We still got clouds over the sky, but finally the sun has broken through!! :D - Shippo Chan

Hey PPL! I finally finished my drawing of Kagome as a Hanyou! urlLink So today was cloudy again (nuts!) AND it was RAINING!!! :$ Yes I'm a little annoyed, but now I'm over it! I just fixed up my Anime Corner. Much easier to manage!!! Well G2G! - Shippo Chan

I've been looking around the internet for InuYasha drawings, especially ones of Kagome as a Hanyou :D Well, I did a urlLink search on google and I only found a couple. So in a day's time I might draw something up. In the meantime just look around my blog and website. Bye! - Shippo Chan

Good morning ... *yawns* It's 6:30am for me up here in NS I don't have much to say, only because IT'S THE FREAKIN' MORNING sorry So... um... now it's past 7:16am and I haven't gotten anything done!! So, I'll post later umm... bye.

Hey, this is my 1st time posting to my blog I've been having trouble with my website, but I got everything fixed. Which is good! Today I went to the Y's Men's Picnic, and I had hotdogs, hamburgers, pop ... it's all good! I couldn't have a blog on my own website only because of a few problems. So, I am slowly getting through the summer, which has been BORING! Have to finish this up quick before I go to sleep... ZzZzZz... Just joking!! Well I g2g. Need sleep. Bye 4 now! Oh, and P.S.: Any LAF members out there? I say "HI!" to all of them! (my LAF name is "shippo")
